radiographic_examinations.findings: Non-union of a fracture of the proximal epiphysis of the middle phalanx.
Sclerosis of a dorsal epiphyseal fragment still attached to the growth plate, without any sign of displacement or consolidation.
High signal between the two epiphyseal fragments on T2-weighted sequences, without contrast enhancement. Excluded pulley rupture and abnormal findings in the extensor or flexor tendons.
